entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
